title: Ravens-Browns MNF Recap: Game of the Year as Lamar Jackson overcomes "cramps" in Baltimore's thrilling win (Football 12/15)
description:
Can we make the leap and label Ravens-Browns on Monday Night Football an 'instant classic?' That's not crazy, that's just how good this game was! MNF had plenty of drama as Baltimore topped Cleveland (and covered) 47-42. Lamar Jackson had cramps or something like that, as his much-speculated exit and miraculous return kept the Ravens firmly in the AFC playoff picture. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Josh Edwards break down everything you need to know from this thriller.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @EdwardsCBS, @E_DeBerardinis
